description: Upgrade plan to migrate project to latest LTS versions

tasks.description: Upgrade to Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4
tasks.requirements: Upgrade JDK to 21, Spring Boot to 3.4, Spring Framework to 6.x, and migrate javax.* to jakarta.* if needed
tasks.taskSummary: Successfully upgraded Java from 17 to 21 and Spring Boot from 3.2.1 to 3.4.1. All build and unit tests passed. No Jakarta migration was required as the project already uses Spring Boot 3.x with Jakarta EE APIs.
